tasks.title: PHASE 1: Backend & Data Pipeline (PRIORITY)
tasks.description: Build solid foundation with real KicksDB data and real-time monitoring
tasks.details: Complete backend infrastructure with KicksDB integration, real-time monitors, and Supabase setup
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data synchronization, real-time updates, and authentication functionality

subtasks.title: KicksDB API Research & Analysis
subtasks.details: Find all endpoints, authentication, rate limits, monitor capabilities
subtasks.testStrategy: Document all API endpoints and test authentication

subtasks.title: Web search for complete KicksDB documentation
subtasks.details: Use web search to find complete API documentation including monitors
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation completeness and monitor features

subtasks.title: Document API authentication methods
subtasks.details: API Key usage, headers, authentication flow for regular API and monitors
subtasks.testStrategy: Test authentication with provided API key

subtasks.title: Identify all available endpoints
subtasks.description: List and categorize all API endpoints
subtasks.details: Products, brands, categories, search endpoints, monitor endpoints
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each endpoint and document responses

subtasks.title: Research KicksDB Monitor system
subtasks.details: Monitor setup, webhook configuration, event types (price, stock, new products)
subtasks.testStrategy: Test monitor configuration and webhook delivery

subtasks.title: Analyze response data structures
subtasks.details: Product schema, monitor event schema, image URLs, pricing, availability

subtasks.title: Document rate limits and constraints
subtasks.details: Requests per minute, daily limits, timeout values, monitor limits

subtasks.title: Test API connectivity and reliability
subtasks.description: Verify API stability and response times
subtasks.details: Multiple test calls, error handling, timeouts, monitor reliability
subtasks.testStrategy: Monitor response times and error rates

subtasks.title: Supabase Database Schema Design
subtasks.description: Create optimized database structure for real-time updates
subtasks.details: Tables, relations, indexes, RLS policies, monitor event tracking
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations and real-time performance

subtasks.title: Design products table schema
subtasks.description: Create products table with real-time update fields
subtasks.details: id, name, description, price, brand_id, category_id, external_id, last_price_update, last_stock_update
subtasks.testStrategy: Test product CRUD operations and update tracking

subtasks.title: Design brands table schema
subtasks.details: id, name, logo_url, description, is_active, external_id

subtasks.title: Design categories table schema
subtasks.details: id, name, description, parent_id, is_active, external_id

subtasks.title: Design product_images table schema
subtasks.description: Create product images table with 2-image limit
subtasks.details: id, product_id, image_url, is_primary, order_index (max 2 per product)

subtasks.title: Design sizes table schema
subtasks.description: Create sizes table for shoe sizes
subtasks.details: id, size_eu, size_us, size_uk, created_at

subtasks.title: Design product_stock table schema
subtasks.description: Create stock management table with real-time updates
subtasks.details: id, product_id, size_id, quantity, reserved_quantity, last_updated, is_available
subtasks.testStrategy: Test stock tracking, reservations, and real-time updates

subtasks.title: Design monitor_events table schema
subtasks.description: Create table for tracking KicksDB monitor events
subtasks.details: id, event_id, event_type, product_id, old_value, new_value, processed_at, status

subtasks.title: Design user_profiles table schema
subtasks.description: Create user profiles with role management
subtasks.details: id, email, first_name, last_name, role, phone, date_of_birth

subtasks.title: Design addresses table schema
subtasks.details: id, user_id, type, address_line1, city, postal_code, country

subtasks.title: Design orders table schema
subtasks.details: id, user_id, order_number, status, payment_status, total_amount

subtasks.title: Design order_items table schema
subtasks.details: id, order_id, product_id, size_id, quantity, unit_price

subtasks.title: Design cart_items table schema
subtasks.details: id, user_id, product_id, size_id, quantity, created_at

subtasks.title: Create database relationships and constraints
subtasks.description: Set up foreign keys and constraints
subtasks.details: Foreign key relationships, check constraints, unique indexes

subtasks.title: Implement Row Level Security policies
subtasks.description: Create RLS policies for all tables
subtasks.details: User/Admin/Vendor role-based access policies
subtasks.testStrategy: Test access control for different roles

subtasks.title: Create database indexes for performance
subtasks.details: Product search, brand filtering, category filtering, real-time update indexes
